product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
This banner design features a modern, tech-savvy layout with a central product image of sleek, over-ear headphones prominently placed. The background is composed of layered abstract shapes and soft circular overlays to create depth and a dynamic flow, enhanced by subtle dotted patterns in the corners. The top section showcases a large heading text layer (`heading`) in a futuristic font, followed by a clear subheading (`subheading`) that describes the product category. The pricing text (`price`) is bold and centered below the product, standing out for emphasis. A call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with accompanying text (`cta`) at the bottom invites user interaction. 

**Color Palette:**
- Lavender Purple: `#8A7CB8` (background base)
- Soft Lilac: `#A394D3` (highlight circle)
- Deep Violet: `#6A5A9E`, `#7A6AAD` (shadows and wave accents)
- Light Violet: `#9985CA`, `#E1D3FF` (accented curves, CTA button)
- White: `#FFFFFF`, `#F3E9FF` (text and detail dots)
- Dark Purple: `#4A3880` (CTA text)
product_color: The product image features a sleek pair of over-ear headphones primarily in soft lavender tones. The key colors are pastel purple (#CBAACB), lilac (#B497BD), deep violet (#6A4E77), and soft silver-gray (#D8CDEB). The overall color palette reflects elegance, youthfulness, and a sense of tech-savvy modernity. The blend of matte and glossy finishes enhances depth, giving the headphones a premium look. The seamless gradient of light to dark purples across the ear cups and headband highlights key elements while providing a cohesive aesthetic. These cool, soft tones will work well in an advertisement banner with clean, minimal design elements.
